EUG 40 SE OLM 40 SE SEA EAT 35 ENE EPH PUW 25 E LWS 40 E BKE 30 SSW
BNO 10 NE LKV LMT 15 N MFR 25 SE EUG.

THERE IS A MRGL RISK OF SVR TSTMS TO THE RIGHT OF A LINE FROM 30 WNW
BUF 40 ESE BFD MRB 15 NNW MCN SEM 10 W TCL 40 W MSL MEM BVX 10 SSE
FLP UNO 40 NW SDF 40 SE IND 10 WNW FWA 25 N ARB 35 ENE MTC.

40 NW GBN 60 SW PRC 40 W PRC 30 ESE IGM 40 SW SGU 30 ENE P38 50 N
